pages.text: × We are taking online reservations! Let’s ensure you get a great table: Book today! We recommend making a reservation ahead of time. Book your table today! Book Table 462 King Street, Charleston, SC 29403 map marker pin Experience ourLounge Live dj's every night with vip tables available. As the evening heats up step inside to the gold standard of Charleston nightlife. Book a VIP table or settle at the bar. Our DJ lineup keeps the party going all night. OUR GARDEN Explore COMPLETE WITH LIVE MUSIC, OUTDOOR BAR,AND SPACIOUS LOUNGE Charleston’s premier destination for elevated nightlife and unforgettable energy. By day, our open-air garden sets the stage for handcrafted cocktails and refined relaxation. By night, Republic transforms—where live entertainment, curated DJs, and an unmatched atmosphere make it the city’s most coveted experience. VIP tables available nightly. Perfect for both daytime and evening private events. OUR FOOD Discover COMPLETE WITH LIVE MUSIC,OUTDOOR BAR, AND SPACIOUS LOUNGE Savor upscale comfort with Charleston flair. From truffle fries and spiced wings to our signature King Street Smashburger, Republic Garden & Lounge brings flavor, energy, and unforgettable vibes to King Street. View our menu see the menu Menus Need the space for your event? we have a perfect place for you! Drinks VIP Tables Dot slide navigation number 1 Dot slide navigation number 2 Dot slide navigation number 3 Dot slide navigation number 4 Dot slide navigation number 5 slideshow start stop playing Reviews Review by - Yelp Kelly D: Fun place for a Saturday night. Crowd skews college age, but we still enjoyed the DJ, drinks and patio. Review by - Yelp Debbie D: We stopped at this quaint restaurant on our way out of town. We loved the fish and chips and the Popcorn shrimp. This Gen-xer loved the 90's playlist. We will definitely return on our next trip to Charleston. Review by - Yelp Terrence J: Great place to hang out at absolutely enjoyed the outside patio with my guest. Good food laid back atmosphere Review by - Yelp Brendan S: ...We came in for one drink and I'm writing this review half drunk BC I didn't want to leave these people + singer. Really impressed. Thanks for all your hard work Review by - Yelp Kelly A: The acoustic band playing outside was awesome. A nice relaxing atmosphere for a Sunday evening with great drinks.
